entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Dunchurch
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:04 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 1:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

Pressure / Tendency: 98.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: -4.1°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries and snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 12:27 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 12:27 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:27 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
